title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Meet your new cleanup hero: Amazon Brand – Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels. Designed to tackle everyday messes and big spills alike, these 2-ply, bright white paper towels deliver powerful performance with smart value.

- More clean with less waste: Flex-a-Size lets you choose the sheet size you need—use a little for small drips or more for major messes.
- Superior absorbency: Up to 75% more absorbent than the leading 1‑ply brand, so spills disappear fast and surfaces dry quickly.
- Big value in every roll: Each Huge Roll has 158 sheets. With 12 rolls in 2 convenient packs of 6, you get the equivalent of 38 regular rolls—fewer restocks, more savings.
- Strong, soft, and dependable: Durable 2‑ply construction stands up to scrubbing while staying gentle on hands and surfaces.
- Trusted alternative: A smart choice if you like Bounty Paper Towels and want excellent performance at a great price.

Stock your kitchen, bath, and cleaning caddy with Presto! Flex-a-Size and be ready for anything—from everyday wipe-ups to weekend projects—all with fewer rolls and less hassle. Clean smarter, spend less, and keep your home sparkling with Presto!.
